channel.title: KVI Computer Show
channel.description: The KVI Computer Show airs live on KVI 570 AM Seattle, every Sunday from 2pm to 3pm Pacific. Fast paced, technology talk and listener calls. Be a part of the show, call in live. Toll Free Nation Wide 888-312-5757, 2pm to 3pm Pacific.
channel.copyright: Â© 2007 Precision Networks & KVI Talk Radio 570
channel.itunes:subtitle: Call in caller driven tech radio.
channel.itunes:summary: The KVI Computer Show airs live on KVI 570 AM Seattle, every Sunday from 2pm to 3pm Pacific. Fast paced, technology talk and listener calls. Be a part of the show, call in live. Toll Free Nation Wide 888-312-5757, 2pm to 3pm Pacific.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Hanis

item.description:
KVI Computer Show #2008.16
This Best of Show Aired April 27th, 2008
It Originally Aired, February 17th, 2008

Technology in Education -
With Special Guest Andi Hudson, Durant ISD, Durant, Oklahoma.

Calls included:
Thom in Auburn - Mac vs. PC in the learning environment
Jerry in Kirkland - Nortons 360 issues.
Lee in Seattle - Former teacher, questions regarding tech in ed.
Tina in Vancouver B.C. - Disk size different than advertised
Ron on his cell - Ron from Coptalk Radio - Question on Internet Filtering
Andrew in New Jersey - Internet filtering, port blocking of certain services/websites

Call In Live Every Sunday 2:00 to 3:00pm (Pacific) 1-888-312-5757
Sponsored in part by www.FastShipPDAs.com

item.title: KVI Computer Show 2007.39
item.description:
KVI Computer Show #2007.39
This show aired live on AM-570 KVI on November 4th 2007.

This show marks the 4th anniversary of the KVI Computer Show, first aired on November 1st 2003

Steve called about powering his laptop in his car, Terry called about his Toshiba laptop, Dick called in about transferring his data to a new pc.

Call In Live Every Sunday 2:00 to 3:00pm (Pacific) 1-888-312-5757
www.precision-networks.net
